description: This is a source file defining Express.js routes for health checks in a Node.js backend. It implements two endpoints: /healthz for comprehensive health status including dependency checks (e.g., database connectivity and memory usage), and /health for basic liveness indication.

methods.name: GET /healthz
methods.description: Performs a health check, including database connectivity and system memory usage, and returns a detailed health status.

methods.name: GET /health
methods.description: Returns a simple service liveness status without dependency checks.
